Ingredients.1: 4  zucchini, cut into spirals using a spiral slicer

Ingredients.5: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.9: 0.25 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste

Directions.1: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Place zucchini spirals in a colander and sprinkle 1 teaspoon salt and Italian seasoning over zucchini; toss to coat. Set colander over a bowl to allow water from zucchini to drain.

Directions.3: Wrap chicken in plastic wrap and place on a work surface; pound into 1/4- to 1/2-inch thickness. Remove plastic wrap and season chicken with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Heat marinara sauce in a saucepan over low heat.

Directions.5: Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray and place over medium-high heat. Cook chicken in the hot skillet until browned and no longer pink in the center, 4 to 5 minutes per side. Transfer chicken to the prepared baking sheet.

Directions.6: Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.

Directions.7: Place zucchini in the same nonstick skillet over medium-high heat; cook and stir until tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 4 minutes.

Directions.8: Spoon marinara sauce over each chicken breast and top with mozzarella cheese.

Directions.9: Broil chicken in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, 1 to 2 minutes.

Directions.10: Transfer zucchini to each serving plate and add chicken. Spoon warm marinara over each piece of chicken and top with Parmesan cheese.
